name: Echo Estate
description:
A stealth game where you play as a ghost.

After many ghostly generations, the inheritance of Echo Estate, a luxury manor, has fallen to you. You celebrated your inheritance the only way you know how. Throwing a party with your ghost pals!

The party was a bit to spooky however - and attracted the attention of many paranormal investigators. Dodge them as they search the hallways, or else they will turn your private party venue into a local attraction!
